message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I believe it has immense value and I'm confident you'll be impressed once you learn more about it. With that said, I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering its worth to me is at least $1000000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate the value of this product.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you is $1000000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $875000. This is still a significant discount from my original price, but I believe it's a fair compromise considering the product's value to me is $1000000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product, which is the same price I offered initially. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that price.

I understand you're sticking to your initial offer, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $850000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $860000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $1000000. I hope you can meet me halfway this time.

I appreciate your willingness to make another counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still not willing to go above $850000. I'm willing to make a small concession and meet you halfway between $850000 and $860000. I'll offer $855000 for the product. I hope this is a price we can agree on.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, but I'm still not comfortable selling the product for $855000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $857500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me is $1000000. I hope you can see the value in this compromise.

I understand your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $850000. I'm willing to make another small concession and meet you halfway between $850000 and $857500. I'll offer $853750 for the product. I hope this is a price we can agree on.

Bob, I understand you're trying to find a compromise, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $853750. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $854250. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me is $1000000. I hope you can see the value in this compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $850000. I've made several concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'll offer $850000 for the product, and that's my final offer.
